name: ImmiFlow â€“ Case & Task Management System

description.content: Designed and implemented a Flask (Python) + SQLite system to manage client cases and internal task workflows.
Developed case templates for multiple visa and education service types, enabling automated task generation with estimated times.
Implemented role-based access control (Admin, Employee) and intelligent task assignment to balance daily workloads (~450 minutes/day).
Built reporting features using Matplotlib and CSV exports for monitoring employee workload and case progress.
Delivered a minimal HTML/JS front-end to streamline case intake, task tracking, and employee dashboards.
Led project as Scrum Master and Backend Developer for a platform designed to provide insights into course offerings and align with specific skill sets.
Coordinated sprint planning and retrospectives in a 5-person Agile team.
Developed backend features including data scraping from the UNSW Handbook and role-based access control.
Communicated closely with frontend and backend team to ensure consistent integration and functionality across platform.
Developed a CNN-based model to identify and classify various leaf diseases accurately.
Optimised model to handle environmental variations, ensuring suitability for real-time deployment in agricultural settings.
Implemented image preprocessing techniques and enhanced model for high accuracy and efficiency.
